body: so I've recently been seeing locked thread about people telling them to physically harm themselves. I've also seen things about ddos threats. Will someone please explain to me what's going on? And why is there so much drama on a block game?
body_tagged: so I've recently been seeing locked thread about people telling them to physically harm themselves. I've also seen things about ddos threats. Will someone please explain to me what's going on? And why is there so much drama on a block game?
title: Drama

replies.body: Honestly, a lot of things get thrown out of proportions and just mentioning it again in this thread will likely cause more drama. I think it would be smart to just drop the matter since rehashing old issues never solves anything. If you weren't involved in the drama, I see no reason for you to be in the know anyway since it really isn't any of your business.
replies.body_tagged: Honestly, a lot of things get thrown out of proportions and just mentioning it again in this thread will likely cause more drama. I think it would be smart to just drop the matter since rehashing old issues never solves anything. If you weren't involved in the drama, I see no reason for you to be in the know anyway since it really isn't any of your business.
